content: Priority shipping typically 2-3 days, uses SpeedyCourier. Tracking updates emailed nightly.
metadata: Extra cost: $9.99 if under $50, free for VIP

content: Standard shipping ~5-7 days, often consolidated at the central distribution hub before final delivery.
2-Day shipping uses ExpressAir. Sunday deliveries not guaranteed except in major metros.
metadata: Cost: $14.99, available for orders of any size

content: International shipping requires customs forms. Delivery times vary 7-14 days. Additional taxes possible.
metadata: Carriers: WorldFreight or GlobalPost, cost depends on zone

content: Returns label can be auto-generated if RMA is approved. Return shipping deducted from refund unless product is defective.
metadata: 14-day return window, contact support@ecorp.com for RMA
